task.title: How to Make Scrabled Eggs with Cheese

context.p:
Ingredients and Materials:
Bacon, 2 strips
3 Eggs
Shredded Cheese
Olive Oil
Tofu, 1 block
Almond Parmesean
Medium Pan
Plate covered with paper towels
Tongs
Bowl and fork
Plastic spatula
Recipie:
Set stover burner to medium heat (5)
Place bacon in pan
Pour olive oil into the pan
Cook for 5 min
Slice tofu block into thin strips
Remove bacon to plate with paper towel with tongs
Crack eggs into bowl and beat with fork
Pour beaten eggs into pan
Place tofu strips into pan
Add cheese to taste
Add almond parmesean to taste
Stir eggs and cheese with plastic spatula for 3 minutes
Serve
